thread.section_title: NobleDEN Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Awesome Shower!
thread.title_full: Awesome Shower! - Review of NobleDEN Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: parkerince
title: Awesome Shower!
text: Very nice room, eco-friendly, comfortable bed, and an awesome shower. I've had waterfall showers before but for some reason this one was way better. Great location, friendly staff, really the only bad thing was that they don't serve breakfast but I had to be up super early and the staff recommended a local place so I was fine.
